article_title: Rand Paul, Scott Brown say ground troops may be needed against ISIS
article_text: DURHAM — U.S. Sen. Rand Paul and Republican Senate candidate Scott Brown both didn’t rule out the idea of ground troops in Syria and Iraq to combat Islamic State militants if the air strikes ordered by President Barack Obama fail to drive back the terrorist organization.
